Metadata.title: Wan AI - Free Online Wan 2.1 AI Video Generator
Metadata.description: Wan 2.1 is an advanced AI video generation model by Alibaba. Create videos from text or images with Wan 2.1 AI.

Hero.title: Turn Your Ideas into Videos with
Hero.description: Wan 2.1 is the leading AI video generation model that turns text and images into stunning, high-quality videos.

Overview.title: What is Wan 2.1 AI
Overview.description: Wan 2.1 is an open-source large-scale video generative AI model developed by Alibaba.  It supports text-to-video (T2V) and image-to-video (I2V) generation, making it easy for users to create high-quality videos from simple inputs. The wan 2.1 ai model are now fully open-source.

KeyFeatures.title: Features of Wan 2.1 AI
KeyFeatures.description: Wan 2.1 is an advanced video generation model designed to deliver high-quality, creative video content with realistic simulations and cinematic effects.

1.title: Complex Motions
1.description: Effortlessly produces lifelike videos featuring complex actions, fluid spins, and smooth transitions between scenes.

2.title: Realistic Physical Simulation
2.description: Generates videos that accurately simulate real-world physics and realistic object interactions.

3.title: Cinematic Quality
3.description: Creates visuals worthy of the big screen, complete with rich textures and varied artistic styles.

4.title: Controllable Editing
4.description: Features a versatile editing system that supports precise modifications using video or image.

5.title: Visual Text Generation
5.description: Produces text and motion effects straight in video from your input.

6.title: Sound Effects & Music
6.description: Generates audio effects and music that align seamlessly with the visuals.

7.title: User-Friendly Tools
7.description: Provides an accessible and intuitive platform for creating remarkable videos with our technology.  Include create videos from text, Image to Video, and customizable Start and End frames.

Feature1.title: Complex Motions
Feature1.description: Effortlessly produces lifelike videos featuring complex actions, fluid spins, and smooth transitions between scenes.

Feature2.description: Generates videos that accurately simulate real-world physics and realistic object interactions.

Feature3.title: Cinematic Quality
Feature3.description: Creates visuals worthy of the big screen, complete with rich textures and varied artistic styles.

Metadata.title: Wan AI Video Generator - Create Professional AI Videos | Wan AI
Metadata.description: Create stunning videos with Wan AI Video Generator.  Powered by Wan2.1 technology, our tool delivers complex motions, realistic physics, and cinematic quality.

Hero.title: Wan AI Video Generator
Hero.description: Powered by Wan 2.1, Generate professional-quality videos with cinematic effects

Form.title: Creation Desc
Form.description: Enter your text prompt below to create your video
Form.placeholder: Describe the video you want to create...

FormSection.title: Create Your Video Now
FormSection.description: Enter your prompt below to generate a professional video with Wan AI video generator. Be specific about scenes, movements, style, and camera angles for best results.

KeyFeatures.title: Why Choose Wan AI Video Generator
KeyFeatures.description: Harness the power of Wan AI video generator to create realistic physics videos from simple text prompts or images.

1.title: Complex Motion Generation
1.description: Generate realistic videos featuring extensive body movements, complex rotations, dynamic scene transitions, and fluid camera motions that look natural and professional.

2.title: Accurate Physics Simulation
2.description: Create videos with realistic object interactions and physical behaviors that adhere to real-world physics, making your content more engaging and believable.

3.title: Cinematic Quality Output
3.description: Enjoy movie-like visuals with rich textures and a variety of stylized effects that give your videos a premium, professional appearance.

4.title: Precise Editing Control
4.description: Make exact adjustments using our universal editing model that allows for detailed modifications using image or video references for perfect results.

5.title: Text Generation in Videos
5.description: Generate dynamic text effects directly in your videos from text prompts in both English and Chinese, enhancing practical applications for marketing and education.

6.title: Integrated Sound Effects
6.description: Add automatically generated sound effects and background music that perfectly align with your visual content and rhythm for complete video productions.

UserGuide.title: How to Use Wan AI Video Generator
UserGuide.description: Creating professional videos with Wan AI is straightforward. Follow these simple steps to generate your first video in minutes.

1.title: Enter Your Prompt
1.description: Type a detailed description of the video you want to create. Include information about scenes, characters, movements, camera angles, and style for best results with the Wan AI video generator.

2.title: Customize Settings
2.description: Adjust video duration, resolution, and style preferences. For more control, upload reference images or videos to guide the Wan AI generation process.

3.title: Generate Your Video
3.description: Click the generate button and let our Wan AI video generator work its magic. Processing time varies based on complexity and length, but most videos are ready within minutes.

4.title: Edit and Download
4.description: Review your generated video, make any necessary adjustments using our editing tools, then download the final result in your preferred format.

CTA.title: Start Creating Professional Videos Today
CTA.description: No specialized hardware or technical expertise required, just your creativity and our powerful AI technology.
CTA.buttonText: Start free trial for Wan AI Video Generator

Metadata.title: Image to Video AI | Transform Image into Dynamic Video | Wan AI
Metadata.description: Create high quality, realistic videos from your photos with Wan 2.1 AI's image to video ai generator.

Hero.title: Wan AI Image to Video Generator
Hero.description: Our advanced AI image to video generator converts your static images into dynamic, high-quality videos with realistic movements, cinematic quality.

Form.title: Upload Image
Form.description: Upload your image and add an optional prompt to customize your video
Form.imageUpload: Drop your image here or click to upload
Form.placeholder: Describe how you want your image animated (optional)

FormSection.title: Create Videos from Images in Seconds
FormSection.description: Upload your image and add a prompt to guide the video generation. Our AI image to video generator will bring your static images to life with fluid motion and cinematic quality.

KeyFeatures.title: Why Choose Wan AI Image to Video Generator
KeyFeatures.description: Powered by the groundbreaking Wan 2.1 technology, our image to video AI generator delivers unmatched quality and versatility.

1.title: Complex Motion Generation
1.description: Our image to video generator excels at creating realistic videos with extensive body movements, complex rotations, and fluid camera motions, bringing your static images to life with natural dynamics.

2.title: Physical Simulation
2.description: Experience videos that accurately simulate real-world physics with realistic object interactions, making your generated content more believable and engaging.

3.title: Cinematic Quality
3.description: Get movie-like visuals with rich textures and stylized effects that transform your images into professional-grade videos with our AI image to video technology.

4.title: Precise Controllability
4.description: Our image to video AI generator offers universal editing capabilities, allowing you to make precise adjustments using image references and prompt guidance.

UserGuide.title: How to Use Our Image to Video AI Generator
UserGuide.description: Transform your images into videos in just a few simple steps:

1.title: Upload Your Image
1.description: Select any high-quality image you want to transform into a video.

2.title: Add Your Prompt
2.description: Describe how you want your image to animate. Include details about movement, transitions, or scene changes.

3.title: Customize Settings
3.description: Adjust video length, resolution, and style preferences to suit your needs.

4.title: Generate and Download
4.description: Click generate and wait while our AI image to video generator works its magic. Download your video once processing is complete.

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Images into Dynamic Videos?
CTA.description: Using Wan AI's image to video ai generator to bring static images to life.

video.title: AI Video Generator
video.description: Browse various video models in the left panel. Describe your imagined scene or upload a reference image to generate your desired video.

ImageUpload.title: Image
ImageUpload.description: Support: JPG, PNG, WEBP | Max file size 10MB

resolution.title: Quailty Setting
resolution.tips: The resolution of the generated video, Higher definition results in better image quality but longer generation time.

style.title: Style
style.tips: Selecting a preset style can meet your needs for customized stylization of video creation, allowing you to quickly complete video creation.

speed.title: Generation mode
speed.tips: Selecting a preset style can meet your needs for customized stylization of video creation, allowing you to quickly complete video creation.

privateMode.title: Private Mode
privateMode.tips: When this option is enabled, hide your generations from the Explore feed.
privateMode.premiumTips: This is a Premium Feature. Please upgrade your premium subscription plan to access it.

queue.title: In queue
queue.description: Your video is in the queue and the queue time is being calculated.

progress.title: Your video is generating
progress.description: The system is operating at full capacity...
